title: Verify Navigation Bar Alignment and Links
description: Check that the top horizontal navigation bar is rendered with all links centered horizontally and that each link navigates to the correct page.

steps.description: Load the homepage
Verify the navigation bar is displayed horizontally at the top
Verify the navigation links are centered horizontally in the viewport
Verify the navigation bar contains links: Home, Profile/About Me, Portfolio/My Work, Contact
Click each navigation link one by one
Verify the app routes to the correct page for each link

title: Homepage Hero Section Centering
description: Ensure that the hero section's cartoon illustration, overlay text, and call-to-action buttons are horizontally and vertically centered across multiple screen sizes.

steps.description: Load the homepage on desktop viewport
Verify the cartoon hero image is horizontally and vertically centered
Verify overlay text is centered over the hero image
Verify call-to-action buttons are horizontally and vertically centered below or on the hero image
Resize viewport to tablet and mobile screen widths
Confirm all hero section elements remain properly centered vertically and horizontally on each viewport size

title: Profile/About Page Content and Styling Validation
description: Verify that the Profile/About page loads with bio, introduction, and skills content correctly, and that the styling conforms to the cartoon/comic theme with consistent typography and layout.

steps.description: Navigate to the Profile/About page
Verify bio, introduction, and skills sections are present and contain expected text content
Verify the layout and typography style matches the cartoon/comic style as per design
Check that text sections are aligned and spaced consistently

title: Portfolio/My Work Page Grid Display
description: Check that the Portfolio/My Work page displays projects in a grid format with correct titles, images, and descriptions for each project. Validate that dashboard metrics are shown as specified.

steps.description: Navigate to the Portfolio/My Work page
Verify that projects are displayed in a grid layout
For each project: verify image is visible and matches design specs
Verify each project displays title and description text correctly
Verify dashboard metrics are displayed for each project as required
Resize the viewport to mobile size
Verify the grid layout adapts responsively without truncation or misalignment

title: Contact Page Layout and Placeholder Text
description: Verify that the Contact page loads with a centered title and placeholder text 'Content coming soon!'. Ensure the layout remains consistent on desktop and mobile devices.

steps.description: Navigate to the Contact page
Verify the page contains a centered title related to Contact
Verify placeholder text 'Content coming soon!' is visible and centered
Check the layout on desktop viewport
Confirm the layout is centered and visually balanced
Resize viewport to mobile viewport
Confirm layout remains centered and placeholder text is fully visible

title: Reusable UI Components Render and Style Test
description: Validate that each reusable UI component (ComicPanel, HalftoneBG, MeteorShower, SpeechBubble) renders correctly and their styles adhere to the cartoon/comic theme using Tailwind CSS.

steps.description: Render each UI component individually on a test page
Verify ComicPanel renders with expected layout, borders, and color styling
Verify HalftoneBG displays with correct background pattern and opacity
Verify MeteorShower component shows expected animated or visual meteor elements
Verify SpeechBubble displays text with correct shape and cartoon style
Confirm all components use Tailwind CSS classes as per configured styling rules

title: Layout and Alignment Consistency Across Core Pages
description: Confirm that after fixes, no layout or alignment issues remain on homepage, profile, portfolio, and contact pages, validated by visual checks and functional testing across major devices.

steps.description: Navigate through homepage, profile/about, portfolio/my work, and contact pages on desktop
Verify no misaligned elements or overflow issues on any page
Repeat navigation on tablet and mobile viewports
Verify all page elements remain visually aligned and content is not cut-off or misplaced

title: Navigation Link Accessibility and Keyboard Navigation
description: Ensure that navigation links are accessible, focusable, and usable via keyboard navigation, complying with accessibility best practices.

steps.description: Load homepage and focus on the navigation bar
Use keyboard Tab key to move focus through navigation links
Verify each navigation link receives focus in logical order
Press Enter key on each focused navigation link
Verify page navigates correctly upon keyboard activation

title: Call-to-Action Buttons Functionality on Homepage
description: Verify the homepage call-to-action buttons in the hero section respond correctly when clicked, navigating to appropriate pages or triggering expected actions.

steps.description: Load homepage
Identify call-to-action buttons in hero section
Click the portfolio exploration button
Verify navigation to Portfolio/My Work page
Return to homepage and click contact button
Verify navigation to Contact page

title: Image Display and Loading Test for Cartoon Illustration
description: Verify that the cartoon homepage image (cartoon1.png) loads successfully, is centered properly, and retains quality across screen resolutions.

steps.description: Load homepage
Verify cartoon1.png image is displayed
Verify image is horizontally and vertically centered within hero section
Test image display on desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports
Verify image quality remains consistent and no distortion occurs on resizing
Simulate slow network or failed image load
Verify appropriate fallback or alt text is shown if image fails to load
